======Silent sm_cvar.======

= Description =

Acts exactly like `sm_cvar`, except it doesn't print output to the console on success.

= Usage =
<!--
`sm_qcvar <cvar> <value>`

|| *Revision Added* || *[CvarFlags Flags]* ||
|| r364 || [FCVAR_NONE] ||
-->
sm_qcvar Cvar Value
